area: St Davids Head to Great Orme Head, including St Georges Channel (10)

forecast.wind: West or southwest 2 to 4 veering northwest 4 to 6, backing west 3 or 4 later.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight at first to the east of Anglesey, otherwise slight or moderate.
forecast.weather: Showers, with fog patches at first, fair later.
forecast.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally very poor at first.
